description: Manage the SMS Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot sms create
commands.summary: Create the SMS Channel on a bot.
commands.syntax:
az bot sms create --account-sid
                  --auth-token
                  --name
                  --phone
                  --resource-group
                  [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                  [--is-validated {false, true}]
                  [--location]
examples:
az bot sms create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --account-sid sid \
--auth-token token --is-validated --phone 1234567890

commands.name: az bot sms delete
commands.summary: Delete the SMS Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot sms show
commands.summary: Get details of the SMS Channel on a bot.
